events.name: ICC Issues Arrest Warrant for Vladimir Putin and Maria Lvova-Belova
events.wd_label: ICC Issues Arrest Warrant for Vladimir Putin and Maria Lvova-Belova
events.wd_description: The International Criminal Court (ICC) issued arrest warrants for Russian President Vladimir Putin and Russian official Maria Lvova-Belova, accusing them of involvement in the deportation of Ukrainian children to Russia.
events.description: The International Criminal Court (ICC) issued arrest warrants for Russian President Vladimir Putin and Russian official Maria Lvova-Belova, accusing them of involvement in the deportation of Ukrainian children to Russia.

events.name: ICC Arrest Warrants
events.wd_description: The International Criminal Court issued arrest warrants for Vladimir Putin and Maria Lvova-Belova, alleging their involvement in a scheme to deport Ukrainian children to Russia.
events.description: The International Criminal Court issued arrest warrants for Vladimir Putin and Maria Lvova-Belova, alleging their involvement in a scheme to deport Ukrainian children to Russia.

events.name: Allegations of Child Deportation
events.wd_description: The ICC stated that it has sufficient evidence to believe that Putin and Lvova-Belova were involved in the deportation of Ukrainian children and that Putin failed to exercise control over subordinates who committed these acts.
events.description: The ICC stated that it has sufficient evidence to believe that Putin and Lvova-Belova were involved in the deportation of Ukrainian children and that Putin failed to exercise control over subordinates who committed these acts.

events.name: Ukraine's Response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky expressed appreciation for the ICC's decision and noted that Ukrainian investigations suggest direct Kremlin involvement in the forced deportation of children.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky expressed appreciation for the ICC's decision and noted that Ukrainian investigations suggest direct Kremlin involvement in the forced deportation of children.

events.name: China Urges G20 to Address Global Debt Issues
events.wd_label: China Urges G20 to Address Global Debt Issues
events.wd_description: China called on G20 nations to conduct a fair and comprehensive analysis of global debt issues, emphasizing the need for joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.
events.description: China called on G20 nations to conduct a fair and comprehensive analysis of global debt issues, emphasizing the need for joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.

events.name: China's Call for Action
events.wd_description: China urged G20 nations to tackle global debt issues comprehensively and effectively, stressing the importance of joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.
events.description: China urged G20 nations to tackle global debt issues comprehensively and effectively, stressing the importance of joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.

events.name: G20 Finance Ministers Meeting
events.wd_description: China's Finance Minister Liu Kun participated in a video meeting with G20 finance ministers and central bank chiefs in Bengaluru, India, calling for a fair analysis of global debt issues.
events.description: China's Finance Minister Liu Kun participated in a video meeting with G20 finance ministers and central bank chiefs in Bengaluru, India, calling for a fair analysis of global debt issues.

events.name: Upcoming IMF Debt Roundtable
events.wd_description: Officials from the IMF, World Bank, and G7 nations will meet for the first face-to-face discussions at the new IMF Global Sovereign Debt Roundtable, with Zambia and Ghana awaiting China's support on debt restructuring.
events.description: Officials from the IMF, World Bank, and G7 nations will meet for the first face-to-face discussions at the new IMF Global Sovereign Debt Roundtable, with Zambia and Ghana awaiting China's support on debt restructuring.

events.name: Honduras Ends Diplomatic Ties with Taiwan, Recognizes One China Policy
events.wd_label: Honduras Ends Diplomatic Ties with Taiwan, Recognizes One China Policy
events.wd_description: Honduras formally ended its diplomatic ties with Taiwan, recognizing the One China policy and establishing relations with the People's Republic of China, following China's strategy of isolating Taiwan diplomatically.
events.description: Honduras formally ended its diplomatic ties with Taiwan, recognizing the One China policy and establishing relations with the People's Republic of China, following China's strategy of isolating Taiwan diplomatically.

events.name: Honduras' Decision to End Ties with Taiwan
events.wd_label: Honduras' Decision to End Ties with Taiwan
events.wd_description: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Honduras announced the formal end of diplomatic ties with Taiwan, recognizing the People's Republic of China as the sole government of China.
events.description: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Honduras announced the formal end of diplomatic ties with Taiwan, recognizing the People's Republic of China as the sole government of China.

events.name: China's One China Policy
events.wd_description: By recognizing the One China policy, Honduras aligns with China's stance that Taiwan is part of China, leading to the termination of diplomatic relations with Taiwan.
events.description: By recognizing the One China policy, Honduras aligns with China's stance that Taiwan is part of China, leading to the termination of diplomatic relations with Taiwan.

events.name: Impact on Taiwan
events.wd_description: China's continued efforts to isolate Taiwan diplomatically, including securing Honduras' recognition, add to the mounting pressure on Taiwan under the leadership of Xi Jinping.
events.description: China's continued efforts to isolate Taiwan diplomatically, including securing Honduras' recognition, add to the mounting pressure on Taiwan under the leadership of Xi Jinping.

events.name: CATL and HGP Agreement for 450MWh Energy Storage Project
events.wd_label: CATL and HGP Agreement for 450MWh Energy Storage Project
events.wd_description: CATL and HGP have signed a supply agreement for a 450MWh battery storage project and established a long-term partnership to promote up to 5GWh of utility-scale and distributed energy storage projects in Texas.
events.description: CATL and HGP have signed a supply agreement for a 450MWh battery storage project and established a long-term partnership to promote up to 5GWh of utility-scale and distributed energy storage projects in Texas.

events.name: Project Announcement
events.wd_description: CATL and HGP have signed a supply agreement for a 450MWh battery storage project to be deployed in Texas, expected to start commercial operation in 2024.
events.description: CATL and HGP have signed a supply agreement for a 450MWh battery storage project to be deployed in Texas, expected to start commercial operation in 2024.

events.name: Product Details
events.wd_description: CATL will supply HGP with the outdoor prefabricated cabin system EnerC, which features high safety, long life, high integration, IP55 protection, and C5 anti-corrosion ratings, suitable for extreme weather conditions.
events.description: CATL will supply HGP with the outdoor prefabricated cabin system EnerC, which features high safety, long life, high integration, IP55 protection, and C5 anti-corrosion ratings, suitable for extreme weather conditions.

events.name: Strategic Importance
events.wd_description: The collaboration leverages CATL's advanced battery technology and HGP's expertise in energy infrastructure and storage resource development to meet the growing demand for renewable energy in Texas and North America.
events.description: The collaboration leverages CATL's advanced battery technology and HGP's expertise in energy infrastructure and storage resource development to meet the growing demand for renewable energy in Texas and North America.

events.name: Market Impact
events.wd_description: This partnership highlights the commitment of both companies to sustainable development and provides convenient solutions to meet the increasing demand for clean energy in Texas and North America.
events.description: This partnership highlights the commitment of both companies to sustainable development and provides convenient solutions to meet the increasing demand for clean energy in Texas and North America.

events.name: t: Long-Term Partnership
events.wd_description: CATL and HGP have established a long-term partnership to promote up to 5GWh of utility-scale and distributed energy storage projects.
events.description: CATL and HGP have established a long-term partnership to promote up to 5GWh of utility-scale and distributed energy storage projects.

events.name: t: HGP's Expertise
events.wd_description: HGP, based in Dallas, Texas, is a leading developer of energy infrastructure and storage resources with decades of experience deploying grid investment-grade storage assets.
events.description: HGP, based in Dallas, Texas, is a leading developer of energy infrastructure and storage resources with decades of experience deploying grid investment-grade storage assets.
